text:
BlueSky is not a trustworthy platform. More info here.

https://twitter.com/davetroy/status/1661285167485399042?s=46&t=dzijwWz0l8sjuW0vH11GAA

Some thoughts here. I’ll check out the posts. I stand by my original analysis with the asterisk that Elon seems to have pissed Jack off, which took some doing. They remain ideologically aligned, however.

https://twitter.com/davetroy/status/1652348804727820291?s=46&t=dzijwWz0l8sjuW0vH11GAA

We broke 100,000 interactions visualized in https://bsky.jazco.dev/ !!! A new cluster is differentiating itself that seems to be an Artist cluster! Combined with the Swiftie cluster, we've got two clusters that now have differentiated based on interest/profession instead of just language! Exciting!

Presenting an exploration of Bluesky's network. Going to go over the community structure, evolution of the network, top accounts, etc.

First, here is the high-level community structure with some labels. Hi res w/ zoom here: https://www.easyzoom.com/imageaccess/884cb1c001cd48e79aca92232bd24a04
Updated my handle here to @@2485 which feels… weird, but okay. Let’s see how that goes.

The way we build & grow social networks and apps can amplify and exacerbate the existing inequities in society. But it doesn’t have to be that way. (This piece is from 7 years ago; it’s about how networks are shaped by who gets access.) https://medium.com/humane-tech/network-inequality-3309fb1aac59
can't wait til we can have custom "what's hot" feeds and i can just crank `yes_butt` all the way up
Staking out a spot here to prevent squatters. Please find me on Mastodon at @@4154934@toad.social and, for now, at @@4154934 on Twitter — until it augurs into the mountainside.
